attributes.additional_details: Kings Meadow Campaign is fighting to save Grade II Listed Open Air Swimming Baths for the People of Reading situated on one of the few remaining green areas - given by George Palmer 1876 - aside the riverside in Reading - Reading's last bit of Heritage. The alternative is high rise hotel and multi car park which WON'T be for the people of Reading. The environment will be severely compromised if this goes ahead.  Please help us save this lovely Victorian/Edwardian pool built in 1902 - opened in 1903 http://www.kingsmeadowbaths.org.uk
